mapper.select: select m.msg_id as id,b.brand_name author,b.avator authorIcon,m.from_id author_id,m.create_at,m.msg_type,m.msg from private_msg m left join brand b on b.customer_id = m.from_id where m.owner_user_id=#{current_user_id} and ((m.from_id = #{friend} and m.to_id= #{current_user_id}) or (m.from_id = #{current_user_id} and m.to_id= #{friend})) order by m.create_at
